content: of the body catching a row 11 k1 k2tog sl1 wyif 3 sts stitch on the head to a stitch on the body cast off row 12 k2tog sl1 wyif 2 sts edge all the way round for the tail sew a fleece pull through to cast off white pompom onto the bottom back of the body for each ear weave in the cast off tail fold the cast on edge in half and sew the cast on edge onto the bunny feet top of the head for each arm sew the side edges make 2 per bunny cast on 9 sts using 3 25mm decrease and gather the cast on sts decrease sew one end of single pointed needles and pale grey yarn start at each onto the sides of the body for each foot the heel sew side edges decrease and gather cast on sts decrease with seam facing the bottom sew each foot onto row 1 to 6 starting on a rs knit row work 6 row the bottom of the body sew on two 6mm buttons in st st for for eyes embroider the nose in a y shape in row 7 k2 kfb k3 kfb k2 11 sts black embroidery thread or mending wool row 8 to 11 starting on a ws purl row work 4 row in st st row 12 p2tog 5 times p1 6 sts pull through to cast off spring delight wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 10 of 15 coal tit row 1 ws k3 sl1 wyif row 2 rs k1 kfb 2 times sl1 wyif 6 sts coal tit body row 3 k5 sl1 wyif make 1 per bird follow the row 4 k2 kfb 2 times k1 sl1 wyif 8 sts blue tit body patt working row 5 k7 sl1 wyif row 1 to 16 in rose mauve row 17 in graphite grey row 18 to 23 row 6 k3 kfb 2 times k2 sl1 wyif 10 sts in pale cream and row 24 to 31 in graphite grey row 7 to 10 k9 sl1 wyif row 11 knit to last 3 sts k2tog sl1 wyif 9 sts coal tit beak row 12 to 17 repeat row 13 six more times 3 sts make 1 per bird follow the blue tit beak patt in row 18 k2tog sl1 wyif 2 sts cloud grey yarn pull through to cast off coal tit tail crocus stems make 1 per bird follow the blue tit tail patt in make 1 per flower cast cloud grey yarn on 3 sts using 3 25mm dpns and pale green yarn coal tit wings using two dpns work i-cord on the 3 sts for 8 row make 2 per bird follow the for the short stems or 13 row for the longer stems blue tit wings patt in cloud break the pale green yarn and join pale yellow grey yarn using the two dpns work i-cord on the 3 sts for 4 more row
